page.title: 06Family Life
page.content: At weekends we spend a lot of time{at {home,}sharing jobs around the house and garden, tidying our bedrooms, washing dishes, baking cakes and looking after pets. We like to get up late and have a cooked breakfast. We sometimes have a barbecue in the garden and nearly all of us have a roast lunch on Sundays. When the weather isn't fine we watch television a lot and enjoy indoor games and puzzles together. Sometimes relations and friends visit us. Many like reading but television is more popular.{If we go out}it is usually for pleasure though many families go shopping together. A car ride in the country is very popular, sometimes visiting friends and relations. Some go to the beach or the park, visit local places of interest and go for country walks and picnics.
